title: When can I expect to be paid?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I have submitted my invoice to accountspayable-fi@unity3d.com and have not yet received my wire transfer.

sections.title: Cause
content: It will take 30 days for the funds to be released.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Once you have invoiced us, it will take 30 days from receipt of the invoice for us to release the funds. Allow a few business days for the wire transfer to come through.
Send invoices to the email address specified in this document (accountspayable-fi@unity3d.com), not to any personal email addresses. The ensures invoices are recorded and processed properly.
